actions.name: Actions
actions.description: Multi-Attack: 2×Talons and 1×Drain, or 2×Drain Drain [Action, Restrained Being | Endure]: 5 (2d4) HP is drained from the Target Talon [Melee Attack]: 7 (2d6) and Restrained if its this Being's second Talon to hit it this Turn

abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description: Booze Hound: It takes half damage from poison-based damage and can sense alcohol within 1 mile as if by All-Sight. It doesn't flee if it is sensing alcohol, except by its Divine-Averse Ability. Divine-Averse: It makes Morale Checks if it can see a divine trinket.
